name: Life Or Death?
description:
Description
You, the player who has to take of all the paperwork of everyone that died on the planet earth. You can read their life info and choose if you would like to keep them dead, or make them live again. 

Controls
Mouse-only. Left click to stamp with the green/red stamper. Left click to drag a sheet. 

Credits
Programming are done by 75ms, inspiration and idea is from Tselmek (@tselmek)
